thread.title: Cannabis debate: 'It is God’s precious plant' | News24
thread.title_full: Cannabis debate: 'It is God’s precious plant' | News24

title: Cannabis debate: 'It is God’s precious plant' | News24
text:
South Africa has taken a step closer to legalising medical marijuana. 
Many have been advocating for the drug over the years and former IFP MP Dr Mario Oriani-Ambrosini took it to Parliament during his own fight against terminal cancer, before his death in 2014. 
News24 sat down with a Joburg maker of cannabis oil for chronic illnesses. Read more on: | 
24.com encourages commentary submitted via MyNews24 We reserve editorial discretion to decide what will be published. Read our comments policy NEXT ON NEWS24
